title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<disableCollisions Sword>>
<<moveToY Mia Stone -90 60>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
<<moveToX Renata Sword -5 60>>
<<moveToY Renata Sword -5 60>>
Mia: That spot up there looks different.
Renata: Watch this!
<<unhide Sword>>
<<moveUp Renata 5 80>>
<<moveUp Sword 100 600>>
[[thefall]]

title: thefall
body:
<<unhide Stone>>
<<moveDown Stone 50 100>>
<<moveRight Mia 20 100>>
<<moveLeft Renata 20 100>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
<<moveDown Stone 50 100>>
<<stopBgMusic>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<moveUp Stone 3 40
<<moveDown Stone 1 40>>
[[thefight]]

title: thefight
body:
Mia-miaangryface: What was that all about?!?!
Renata: I was trying to get it down!
Mia-miaangryface: Look at how big that stone was! It could've killed me!
<<faceUp Mia>>
Mia-miafumingface: You keep doing this!
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveUp Mia 10 50>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 50>>
Mia-miafumingface: The river!
<<moveUp Mia 10 50>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 50>>
Mia-miafumingface: Falling through this hole!
<<moveUp Mia 10 50>>
<<unhide Petal>>
<<moveDown Petal 30 120>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 50>>
<<moveDown Petal 20 120>>
Mia-miafumingface: The journal!
<<moveDown Petal 30 120>>
<<moveUp Mia 10 50>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 50>>
Mia-miafumingface: You're going to get us killed!
[[theapology]]

title: theapology
body:
<<setBgMusic ThemeOfForgiveness.mp3>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
Renata-renatasorryface: I....
<<moveToX Renata Mia 0 60>>
<<moveToY Renata Mia -10 60>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
Renata-renatasorryface: I.....don't know what to say....
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
Renata-renatasorryface: I'm a terrible friend...
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
Mia-miaangryface: ......
Mia-miaangryface: ...no......
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
Mia-miaangryface: ...you were just trying to get us out of here....
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
Renata-renatasorryface: I just get....so excited...
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
Mia-miaangryface: ...I know....
[[thememories]]

title: thememories
body:
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
Mia: Remember last year when the bullies cornered me?
Renata: ...yeah?
Mia: When you picked up the log and started smacking them with it?
Renata-renatahappyface: Haha!
Renata: That was fun.
Mia: ...you've always had my back. I love you, Nata!
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveDown Mia 3 10>>
<<moveUp Renata 3 10>>
Renata: I'll be more careful, okay?
<<moveDown Renata 3 10>>
<<moveUp Mia 3 10>>
[[thefind]]

title: thefind
body:
<<moveLeft Renata 5 10>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
Renata: What's that?
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
Mia: It looks like a petal!
Renata: Could it be the last one?
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToX Mia Petal 0 60>>
<<hide Petal>>
Mia: Let's try it!
[[thecleanup]]
